attributes.action: nominate John Wick, the man behind the leaking of MPs expenses, for services to the people of this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that John Wick has done a huge service to the people of this country by exposing the scandal of MPs' expenses. In doing so, he has taken a very real personal risk but he has taken the morally righteous path and we believe that his service to the British public merits formal and official recognition on our behalf.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
